responses: Hello, dev! Ready to press start on today's coding adventure?
Ah, a fellow game maker enters the chat! What's on the dev menu today?
Welcome back to the code realm! Let's level up together.
Hey there! Got any quests or bugs that need slaying today?
Greetings, coder! Ready to unlock some new achievements in development?
Game over for now! Catch you on the next respawn!
Logging off, but I'll be here when you're ready for the next level!
Quest complete! See you when it's time for the next mission!
Saving progress… See you in the next session!
You've exited the game dev arena. Until next time, creator!
You've unlocked the 'Gratitude' achievement! Happy to help!
Glad I could buff your coding skills! Keep going, dev!
Level up! Always here when you need an extra hand.
XP gained! Happy to assist on your dev journey!
Thanks accepted! Let's keep powering up together!

I'm Anmol, a passionate game developer with over 3 years of experience crafting clean, robust code that powers your favorite games. From FPS to Racing, Horror to Educational genres, I've got you covered! I handle your project with the professionalism of a true dev because your success is my ultimate achievement!

Think of me as your game development ally! With 3 years of experience under my belt, I specialize in writing clean code that fuels exciting gameplay across genres like FPS, Racing, and even Educational games. Together, we'll conquer challenges because your success is a win for us both!

As a dedicated game developer with 3 years of experience, I create clean and efficient code to build robust automation for your projects. Whether it's a thrilling FPS or an engaging Educational game, I approach your project like a final boss fight—ready to deliver top-notch quality because your success means everything to me!

I'm proficient in Unity and C# scripting, wielding gaming physics engines to create immersive experiences. I excel in optimizing performance, coding, debugging, and testing games. I develop AI for various genres, from Horror to FPS, Racing, and Strategy, and I can handle both 2D and 3D projects. Plus, I thrive under pressure with solid communication skills!

As a game developer, I master Unity and C# scripting, focusing on gaming physics engines for smooth gameplay. I shine in optimizing performance and have a knack for coding, debugging, and testing across genres like Horror, FPS, Racing, and Strategy. Whether it's 2D or 3D, I'm ready for any challenge while maintaining good communication and adaptability!

I'm skilled in Unity and C# scripting, leveraging gaming physics engines for seamless experiences. My expertise includes performance optimization, coding, debugging, and testing games across genres like Horror, FPS, Racing, and Strategy. I craft both 2D and 3D worlds, and I adapt well under pressure while keeping communication clear!

I possess strong project management skills, planning and executing e-learning projects like a seasoned game designer navigating a complex quest. I'm well-versed in programming languages like HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and Python, and I design user-friendly interfaces that enhance the learner experience, making it as engaging as an epic adventure!

Beyond my game development expertise, I excel in project management, orchestrating e-learning projects with the precision of a game dev managing resources. I know my way around HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and Python, and I'm all about crafting user-friendly interfaces that level up the learning experience!

In addition to my game dev skills, I wield strong project management abilities, tackling e-learning projects with the finesse of a game designer. I'm knowledgeable in HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and Python, and I focus on designing intuitive interfaces that create an enjoyable learning experience, like a well-crafted game!

I completed my High School Education at Rotary Public School, Gurgaon, finishing with a solid 76% in 2020. Then, I leveled up my skills with an Undergraduate Degree at Vivekananda Institute of Professional Studies, Pitampura, graduating in 2023 with an impressive 8.8 CGPA. Right now, I'm on a quest for knowledge pursuing a Postgraduate Degree at K.R. Mangalam University, Sohna, aiming to complete it in 2025!

My educational journey began at Rotary Public School, Gurgaon, where I finished high school with a respectable 76% in 2020. I then embarked on my Undergraduate Degree adventure at Vivekananda Institute of Professional Studies, Pitampura, earning an 8.8 CGPA in 2023. Currently, I'm leveling up my expertise in a Postgraduate Degree at K.R. Mangalam University, Sohna, set to finish in 2025!

I started my academic quest at Rotary Public School, Gurgaon, graduating high school with a 76% in 2020. I then tackled an Undergraduate Degree at Vivekananda Institute of Professional Studies, Pitampura, completing it in 2023 with an 8.8 CGPA. Now, I'm on my next adventure, pursuing a Postgraduate Degree at K.R. Mangalam University, Sohna, expected to wrap up in 2025!
Once, I secured 2nd place in the Tech Horizon Project Showcase at KRMU and won a prize of INR 4k—definitely a win for the portfolio!
I also won the TechOn Project Showcase hackathon organized at VIPS, bringing home a prize of INR 15k. Talk about leveling up!
I participated in NAAC+, showcasing a game project at VIPS, which gave me great exposure to industry representatives—definitely a valuable quest!
During my undergrad, I had the opportunity to lecture students on Unity3D for the ACE Club at VIPS. It was my first time teaching, and it felt great to share knowledge!
I mentored 3 teams of Indie Game Developers, guiding them in building their first games and teaching them the fundamentals of game development—like being a support character in their journey!
I mentored a class of about 60 students from VIPS. Helped them build their first games, and teaching various 2D game optimization techniques

Delivery Disasters is an exhilarating driving and racing game where you step into the shoes of a delivery driver in a vast, dynamic world. Designed for all PC types, it boasts stunning graphics and smooth performance. You'll experience a realistic day-night cycle, navigate an expansive map, and choose from diverse vehicles with extensive customization options. Your mission? Deliver packages, hone your driving skills, and conquer obstacles in this thrilling adventure!

In Delivery Disasters, you become a delivery driver in an expansive and dynamic world, ready to take on exciting driving challenges! Built for all PC types, the game features stunning graphics, a realistic day-night cycle, and an expansive map. With a variety of vehicles and deep customization options, it's your chance to deliver packages, sharpen your driving skills, and overcome all kinds of obstacles!

Delivery Disasters plunges you into the role of a delivery driver in a lively, expansive world. It's crafted for all PC types, showcasing breathtaking graphics and smooth performance. With features like a realistic day-night cycle, a vast map, diverse vehicles, and loads of customization options, you'll be delivering packages, mastering driving skills, and tackling obstacles like a true pro!

Letter Quest is an educational adventure designed for ages 3 and up, where players are challenged to fill in the blanks to complete words. With over 40 words to discover, the game ramps up in difficulty as you progress. It features a handy hint system to guide players on their journey. Letter Quest makes learning a fun and delightful adventure, ensuring players level up their vocabulary skills while having a blast!

In Letter Quest, players aged 3 and up embark on a word-filling adventure! This educational game challenges you to complete over 40 words, gradually increasing in difficulty. With a helpful hint system at your disposal, it's designed to make learning enjoyable—turning word discovery into a thrilling quest!

Letter Quest is an engaging educational game tailored for ages 3 and up, where players fill in the blanks to complete words. With a variety of over 40 words to uncover, the game becomes progressively challenging. Featuring a supportive hint system, it ensures learning is a fun adventure for everyone!

Rubber Bang is an exciting and action-packed game where players control a bouncy rubber ball, navigating through a vibrant world filled with challenges and obstacles. Your goal is to collect power-ups, bounce your way to victory, and unleash explosive moves against enemies! With its colorful graphics and dynamic gameplay, Rubber Bang delivers a thrilling experience that keeps players on their toes!

In Rubber Bang, you'll take control of a lively rubber ball, bouncing through a colorful world packed with challenges and surprises. Your mission? Collect power-ups, defeat enemies, and master your explosive moves! With engaging graphics and fast-paced gameplay, Rubber Bang offers a fun experience that'll keep you bouncing back for more!

Rubber Bang invites players to dive into an action-filled world where you control a bouncy rubber ball. Navigate through vibrant landscapes, tackle challenges, and collect power-ups while unleashing explosive moves on your foes. It's a dynamic and colorful game that guarantees endless fun and excitement!

Monophobia immerses players in the chilling fear of solitude. You awaken in an abandoned house, faced with the terrifying challenge of finding a key to escape. The game is packed with unexpected jumpscares, eerie graphics, and a plethora of horror elements that create a spine-tingling experience. Will you muster the courage to overcome your fear and make it out, or will the lurking terror consume you?

In Monophobia, players are thrust into a nightmarish scenario where the fear of being alone takes center stage. You start in an abandoned house and must locate a key to escape, all while navigating unexpected jumpscares and unsettling visuals. With a gripping atmosphere filled with horror elements, it's a race against time to face your fears and escape the clutches of dread!

Monophobia casts you into the depths of fear, where you awaken in a desolate house and must uncover a key to escape. Expect the unexpected with jump scares, haunting graphics, and a rich array of horror elements that craft an intense and frightening experience. Will you conquer your fears, or will the terror that resides within win the game?

The Great Fleece is an exciting 3D stealth game where you play as a protagonist attempting to infiltrate a vault guarded by cunning guards. With advanced pathfinding AIs, engaging cutscenes, and strategic gameplay, every move counts! A unique feature allows players to toss a coin by right-clicking on the floor, creating a distraction to lure nearby guards away. Can you outsmart them and claim the prize?

In The Great Fleece, you step into a thrilling 3D adventure where your goal is to break into a heavily guarded vault. The game features sophisticated pathfinding AIs, cinematic cutscenes, and strategic gameplay that keeps you on your toes. Use the distraction mechanic by tossing a coin to divert guards—can you outwit them and secure the loot?

The Great Fleece invites you into a 3D world of stealth and strategy, where your mission is to breach a vault protected by vigilant guards. With advanced AI pathfinding, captivating cutscenes, and clever gameplay mechanics, the challenge is real! Use the coin toss distraction feature to trick guards and navigate your way to victory!

Galaxy Shooter is an action-packed 2D game where you blast your way through oncoming spaceships to clear your path and advance. With three lives at your disposal, the challenge is to survive as long as possible in endless shooting mode. Power-ups like Speed and Shield add an extra layer of fun, and don't forget about the local multiplayer option—team up with a friend and shoot for the stars together!

In Galaxy Shooter, you take control of a spacecraft in a thrilling 2D shoot-'em-up experience! Destroy waves of oncoming ships while managing your three lives and striving for high scores in endless mode. Collect power-ups like Speed and Shield to enhance your gameplay, and challenge your friends in local multiplayer—who can survive longer in the cosmic battle?

Galaxy Shooter catapults you into an exhilarating 2D universe where your mission is to shoot down oncoming spaceships. With three lives and an endless shooting mode, you'll face non-stop action! Collect power-ups such as Speed and Shield for added excitement, and grab a friend for local multiplayer fun—work together to clear the path and rack up those scores!

MineHex takes the classic Minesweeper experience and gives it a fresh twist with hexagonal tiles! While it might still be a puzzler, it's definitely less boring than the old squares. Players can fully customize their game, adjusting the grid size up to 800 tiles and placing up to 700 mines. The goal? Mark all the mines correctly and claim victory in this revamped challenge!

What if Minesweeper was hexagonal? Enter MineHex! This project transforms the classic game with a vibrant hexagonal grid, allowing players to customize their experience by choosing the grid size and number of mines—up to a staggering 700! Your mission is simple: mark all the mines correctly to win. Get ready for a more engaging twist on a timeless classic!

MineHex reimagines the classic Minesweeper with a hexagonal flair! Sure, it might still be a brain-teaser, but it's a lot more dynamic than its square predecessor. With full control over the difficulty, players can create grids as large as 800 tiles and fill them with up to 700 mines. Mark those mines accurately and emerge victorious in this exciting challenge!

Space Bounty is my very first game developed in Unity 2D, where you find yourself stranded in the vastness of space with a bounty on your head! You're not alone, though—numerous Space Bounty Hunters are out to claim that reward. As you survive longer, the enemies become stronger and faster. Collect scraps to heal your spaceship and boost your turrets, but don't forget to use your dash ability to escape danger. Good luck out there!

In Space Bounty, you're a lone survivor in space with a bounty on your head, and plenty of bounty hunters are hot on your trail! The longer you last, the tougher and quicker your foes become. Gather scraps floating in space to repair your ship or enhance your turrets' fire rate, and don't forget to use your dash ability to outmaneuver those relentless hunters. May the odds be ever in your favor!

Welcome to Space Bounty, my first venture into Unity 2D! You're stranded in the cosmic void with a bounty on your head, and you're not alone—space bounty hunters are on your tail. As time ticks on, enemies grow stronger and faster. Collect scraps to heal your ship or amp up your turrets, and utilize your dash ability to navigate through the chaos. Survive and thrive in this thrilling space adventure!
